required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: CHD Patient's Concern on Cardiac Rehabilitation
clinical_study.official_title: CHD Patient's Concern on Cardiac Rehabilitation and Its Socio-psychological Associated Factors

brief_summary.textblock: Our study focuses on the question about cardiac rehabilitation (CR) patients with coronary heart disease are concerned about demonstrating the association between the patients' view of CR and socio-psychological associated factors. In our study, all participants are invited to choose at least 5 questions in 15 questions or provide their questions regarding their doubt about the CR after filling in their personal information. The selectable questions can be categorized into five titles: the content or purpose of CR, the method of CR, the advantage of CR, the adverse effect of CR, and the expenditure of CR.

primary_outcome.measure: The total number of different selected questions
primary_outcome.description: All participants are invited to choose at least 5 questions in 15 questions or provide their questions regarding their doubt about the CR after filling in their personal information. As a result, we calculate and collect the total number of different selected questions for each patients.

primary_outcome.measure: The variety of different selected questions
primary_outcome.description: All participants are invited to choose at least 5 questions in 15 questions or provide their questions regarding their doubt about the CR after filling in their personal information. As a result, we calculate and collect the variety of different selected questions for each patients.

arm_group.arm_group_label: CHD patients participating in the cardiac rehabilitation

intervention.description: all participants in our study are invited to choose at least 5 questions in 15 questions or provide their questions regarding their doubt about the CR after filling in their personal information
intervention.arm_group_label: CHD patients participating in the cardiac rehabilitation

study_pop.textblock: Patients with coronary heart disease eligible for the study must be at least 18 years of age or greater, able to participate in cardiac rehabilitation after medical judgments by the physicians and provide the written informed consent. Moreover, the participants must understand the questionnaire content and complete it.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age >18 years old
- patients diagnosed as coronary heart disease
- able to participate in cardiac rehabilitation after medical judgments
- understand the questionnaire content
- agree to participant in the study and provide the written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- unable to complete the questionnaire
- patients with severe illness, such as severe infection, heart failure, renal insufficiency, and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
